page.topic: Using Arguments to Filter Records in a Page Layout
page.description: Arguments can be defined for a Page Layout Component which can be used in server-side show/hide expressions as well as filtering Grid Components and Reports.
page.discussion: To learn more, watch the videos below:

videos.title: Creating a Page Layout with Arguments to Filter a Grid and Report
videos.description: The videos below show how you can put a button in a grid to open a pop-up window. The pop-up window shows a PageLayout component that is filtered based on data in the current grid row. A second button opens a pop-up window showing a TabbedUI component that is also filtered based on data in the current grid row.
